critique: The document is a formal executive order. It amends a previous order to allow officers and employees of the Police or Prison Departments of the Virgin Islands to be appointed to positions in the office of the United States Marshal for the Virgin Islands. The language is formal and legalistic, and the purpose is to make a specific change to personnel rules. There is no indication of any particular emotion being conveyed. Therefore, I will assign a score of 1 for all emotions in the initial scores.
